where - kahaan: to take a bath or a shower - nahana
first one, regular one - pahLaa vaaLaa
let’s see, we’ll see - DekhTen hain
to form a line - LaaiN LagNaa
Tamil, people and culture from Tamil Nadu in southern India - TaamiL
large colorful design, made on the floor with flower petals or colored powders - raNgoLii
to put in, to put on something - daaLNaa
at your place - aap ke yahaan
like that, by the way - vaiSe
in the middle, in between - biic
skewered meat kabab - “Shish Kebab” - sik kabaab
as a substitute, instead - baDLe mein
to come out, to leave - NikaLNaa
nothing at all - kuch bhii Nahiin
friend, used very colloquially in the same way as “dude” - yaar
day after tomorrow OR day before yesterday - parSon
to invite home - ghar pe buLaaNaa
to be pleased, to like - acchaa LagNaa
to come to work - kaam pe aaNaa
to decrease, to come down - uTarNaa
